section.title: Video
section.p: Videos are stored in the res/video folder. Like with image folders, multiple video folders with different resolutions may exist.

section.title: Supported Formats
section.p: More video formats may be added in the future.

section.title: Video Playback Performance
section.p: The Theora decoder is relatively slow, try to keep resolution and bitrate low to allow for smooth playback on slower computers.
